AYANDELE OREOLUWA OLUWAFEMI
Ore-02 (Ay-Ore) | Github Email: ayandeleoluwafemi@gmail.com
Ayandele Oreoluwa | Linkedin Mobile: 08126050750
Address: 48, Odunguwa Street, Bariga, Lagos Nigeria
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Highly motivated and detail-oriented Cloud/DevOps enthusiast with hands-on experience in cloud
infrastructure, monitoring tools. Adept at troubleshooting, application performance monitoring, and
collaborating within technical teams. Passionate about leveraging technology to optimize operations and
improve user experiences.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
• Languages: Python, JavaScript, Bash Scripting (Linux)
• Platforms/Tools: AWS (Amazon Web Services), Linux, Docker, GitHub, Gitlab CI
• Soft Skills: Effective communication, team collaboration, leadership, problem-solving, time
management, adaptability, flexibility, critical thinking, attention to detail
WORK EXPERIENCE
Infrastructure/DevOps Trainee Yaba, Lagos (Remote)
Bincom Dev Center | Apprenticeship August 2024 - Present
• Developed skills in cloud computing, focusing on AWS services and infrastructure management.
